Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%app_apk APK File The full path to the APK of the app. You can use the Copy File action to copy it somewhere and rename it if you like.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%app_icon Icon Icon for the app</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%app_install_time First Install Time Time in seconds since EPOCH that app was first installed</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%app_installer_package Installer Package Name Package name for the app that installed this app. Can be used to check if app was installed from Google Play.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%app_min_sdk Minimum SDK Minimum SDK version for the app.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%app_name Name Name of the App</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%app_package Package Unique package name for the app</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%app_permissions() Permissions Permissions the app requests.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8>%app_permissions_granted() Permissions Granted Corresponds to the %permissions array. true or false depending if the permission has been granted or not.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9>%app_target_sdk Target SDK Target SDK version for the app.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10>%app_uid APK File The kernel user-ID that has been assigned to this application; currently this is not a unique ID</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11>%app_update_time Last Update Time Time in seconds since EPOCH that app was last updated</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12>%app_version_code Package Version The version of the app in code format (a number)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13>%app_version_label Package Version Label The version of the app as you usually see it</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

Share.d:
Important: need the Tasker beta for this. (https://joaoapps.com/beta-testing/)
Will show a notification of the time you spent in an app in the last 24 hours.
Will show a pop-up notification if you've used the app for over 60 minutes in a single day.

Share.d:
This project will give you multiple ways of automatically or semi-automatically toggle the dark mode on your Android 10 device.

Check out the demo video here: https://youtu.be/DpEIBgGLFNA.

IMPORTANT: You need Tasker 5.8.4 for this to work. Sign up for the beta here if needed.

Switch to last app with either a bubble or navigation bar icon.
Demo here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdawhsMpmLk
Also included are some other demos that you can do with the new App actions in Tasker, like showing a pie chart of the most used apps, or a notification or navigation bar with the 5 most recent apps that you can switch to.

A set of different java methods to get the current locale for your device.
Notes: - Thanks to @gerardo246 to contribute. - To know more about Locales, and what these values represents, you can go here.

Action.label: <i>You can still getting the rest of locales from 'METHOD 1' just calling to 'locale.xxx' (A22).

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%gd_id() File ID Unique ID for the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%gd_md5() MD5 MD5 checksum of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%gd_mimetype() Mime Type Type of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%gd_time() File Time The last time the file was modified by anyone. Expressed in Seconds since Epoch (similar to %TIMES)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%gd_name() File Name Name of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%gd_size() File Size Size of the file (in bytes) on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%gd_uploaded() Uploaded true if file was uploaded, false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%gd_weburl() Web URL URL that can be used to show the file on your Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

app</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%app_install_time First Install Time Time in seconds since EPOCH that app was first installed</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%app_installer_package Installer Package Name Package name for the app that installed this app. Can be used to check if app was installed from Google Play.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%app_min_sdk Minimum SDK Minimum SDK version for the app.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%app_name Name Name of the App</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%app_package Package Unique package name for the app</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%app_permissions() Permissions Permissions the app requests.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8>%app_permissions_granted() Permissions Granted Corresponds to the %permissions array. true or false depending if the permission has been granted or not.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9>%app_target_sdk Target SDK Target SDK version for the app.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10>%app_uid APK File The kernel user-ID that has been assigned to this application; currently this is not a unique ID</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11>%app_update_time Last Update Time Time in seconds since EPOCH that app was last updated</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12>%app_version_code Package Version The version of the app in code format (a number)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13>%app_version_label Package Version Label The version of the app as you usually see it</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%app_used() App Used The time the app was used, or the times it was opened, depending on what you selected</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%app_icon() Icon Icon for the app</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%app_name() Name Name of the App</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%app_package() Package Unique package name for the app</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3></StringArray>
